entries.title: Minyts Advances Development of MCC (Minyts Corporate Cloud)
entries.excerpt: We’re advancing development of MCC, the Minyts Corporate Cloud, a modular platform being built to support how companies operate, scale, and manage complexity across systems, teams, and data.

entries.title: Tildilyn Is Introduced as Minyts’ Universal Utility Venture
entries.excerpt: We’re introducing Tildilyn as a new venture within Minyts, built as a universal utility service designed to expand over time and support individuals and businesses across multiple sectors as capabilities are developed and put into operation

entries.title: Follow Minyts on Facebook
entries.excerpt: Stay connected as our venture universe takes shape
